body:
It's hard to think that one year has already gone by.
I've learnt so much this past year.
I've made a ton of friends and have laughed more than anyone should.

If you told me a year ago that I'd be a staff member on here, there's no way I'd believe you.
The fact that it's my job to help others is amazing.
At times it's a lot of hard work but it's very rewarding.

Thanks for a great year Avicus, it's been a honour.

Here's to another awesome year!

title: One Year Anniversary.

replies.body:
Thanks Snow, for being one of the best moderators we have at the moment.
I haven't got to know you so well because of the timezones but I'm pretty sure you're an awesome dude.
Congrats for 1 year and for not getting demoted in the re-assesment day! c:

replies.body:
Cheers!
Congrats on one year!
I think you've done  great job as a staff member!

replies.body: Congrats on one year! You are a great moderator, keep it up! :D
replies.body_tagged: Congrats on one year! You are a great moderator, keep it up! :D

replies.body: I always knew you'd become staff, Snow. Even before you applied, I knew it was your line of work. It's a pleasure to have known you for such a long time, and please. Keep in touch alright? You're phenomenal, bud. Keep it up!

replies.body:
Yay, welcome to the 1 year club buddy!
You're an amazing friend, and probably made me laugh more than you did :D

replies.body: Thanks for everything you've done Snow, hope you stay here <3

replies.body: One Year?! Awesome. Well done dude (;
replies.body_tagged: One Year?! Awesome. Well done dude (;

replies.body: I still need my first year, it's great to work alongside you, Snow. Here's to another year!

Congratulations on one year, Snow.
Let's hope for another great one!
